arts.ttl: David Clowes' Derby County cash injection cannot go on forever - £3m reveal hints at next move - Richard Cusack - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: "The addition of players, for a club of the size and stature of Derby, but also with the issues to be addressed financially, should be viewed as an investment moving forward and not a sunk cost that has no resale value to the football club. "Additions of players that have the potential for a significant resale value may well form the basis of a business model moving forward, much in the same way that Brighton & Hove Albion have found a path to profitability year on year through player trading having relied heavily on the generosity of owner Tony Bloom in the earlier years of his reign as owner.

arts.ttl: 'My fault' - Paul Warne issues Derby County verdict and nails cause of Swansea defeat - Derbyshire Live
arts.sum: And while Derby were the better team for 60 minutes, head coach Warne said they had given themselves too much to do. Paul Warne said Derby County paid the price for being "soft" after a dismal start to the first half helped Swansea to a 2-1 win at Pride Park.

arts.ttl: Luke Williams feels Swansea ‘lost grip’ on game despite sealing victory at Derby
arts.sum: The Swans stunned Pride Park into silence with less than two minutes on the clock.

arts.ttl: Swansea beat Derby to get back to winning ways
arts.sum: Zan Vipotnik and Ronald scored early in the first half to help Swansea bounce back from successive defeats with a 2-1 victory at Derby.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Swansea as Rams pay the price after woeful start
arts.sum: Derby pushed for an equaliser as Swansea struggled to get out of their half as Dajaune Brown saw a volley go wide of the post while Kane Wilson's header to the back post was cleared. Derby's fans were growing increasingly restless as Swansea continued to enjoy the bulk of possession but Curtis Nelson saw a header saved before Nathaniel Mendez-Laing saw a shot deflected into the arms of Lawrence Vigouroux.

arts.ttl: Derby County 1-2 Swansea City: Visitors hold off fight back to claim victory at Pride Park

arts.ttl: Swansea bounce back from successive defeats with victory at Derby
arts.sum: Early goals from Zan Vipotnik and Ronald handed the Swans a deserved half-time lead.
